mapper.select: SELECT CATEGORY_NAME FROM CATEGORY WHERE CATEGORY_NO = #{categoryNo}

SELECT GS.GOODS_NO, TITLE, SELL_PRICE, CREATED_AT,
GLL.MEMBER_NO,
(SELECT IMAGE_PATH FROM GOODS_IMAGE GI WHERE IMG_ORDER = 0 AND GI.GOODS_NO = GS.GOODS_NO) IMAGE_PATH FROM GOODS_SELL GS
LEFT JOIN (SELECT MEMBER_NO, GOODS_NO FROM GOODS_LIKE WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{loginMemberNo}) GLL ON (GS.GOODS_NO = GLL.GOODS_NO)
WHERE CATEGORY_NO = #{categoryNo} AND GOODS_DEL_FL = 'N'
AND SELLER_NO IN (SELECT MEMBER_NO FROM "MEMBER" WHERE
MEMBER_ADDRESS LIKE '%${item}%'
)
ORDER BY CREATED_AT DESC
ORDER BY SELL_PRICE ASC
ORDER BY SELL_PRICE DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM GOODS_SELL WHERE GOODS_DEL_FL = 'N'
AND SELLER_NO IN (SELECT MEMBER_NO FROM "MEMBER" WHERE
MEMBER_ADDRESS LIKE '%${item}%'
)

SELECT GS.GOODS_NO, TITLE, SELL_PRICE, CREATED_AT,
GLL.MEMBER_NO,
(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM GOODS_LIKE GL WHERE GL.GOODS_NO = GS.GOODS_NO) LIKE_COUNT, (SELECT IMAGE_PATH FROM GOODS_IMAGE GI WHERE IMG_ORDER = 0 AND GI.GOODS_NO = GS.GOODS_NO) IMAGE_PATH FROM GOODS_SELL GS
LEFT JOIN (SELECT MEMBER_NO, GOODS_NO FROM GOODS_LIKE WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{loginMemberNo}) GLL ON (GS.GOODS_NO = GLL.GOODS_NO)
WHERE GOODS_DEL_FL = 'N'
AND SELLER_NO IN (SELECT MEMBER_NO FROM "MEMBER" WHERE
MEMBER_ADDRESS LIKE '%${item}%'
)
ORDER BY LIKE_COUNT DESC,
CREATED_AT DESC
SELL_PRICE ASC
SELL_PRICE DESC
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM GOODS_LIKE WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND GOODS_NO = #{goodsNo}
